rioko.events.listeners

Class AbstractDataChangeListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • rioko.events.listeners.AbstractListener
      • rioko.events.listeners.AbstractDataChangeListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Listener

    public abstract class AbstractDataChangeListener
extends AbstractListener
    Abstract class to listen a DataChangeEvent. It has the information of which Object is being followed.
    Author:
    Antonio
